title: Fix Menu Display Test
body:
For this test

```
  it('Displays the Advanced Settings Option', () => {
        cy.get('[data-cy=more_button]').click({force: true});
        cy.get('[data-cy=advanced_setting]').click({force: true})
        cy.get('[data-cy=annotation_setting_menu]').should('be.visible')
        // cy.get('[data-cy=annotation_setting_menu]').should('be.visible')

```

The `    // cy.get('[data-cy=annotation_setting_menu]').should('be.visible')` line was commented due to some issues with the display.

Error is:

```

Timed out retrying after 4000ms: expected '<div.layout.column>' to be 'visible'

This element <div.layout.column> is not visible because it has CSS property: position: fixed and it's being covered by another element:

<button type="button" class="v-btn v-btn--icon v-btn--round theme--light v-size--default primary--text">...</button>
```

We need to correct this and make the test pass as usual. For now the check was commented
